snippet: Taking control by breaking serve immediately after a rain delay, eighth-seeded John Isner hit 29 aces to beat Dmitry Tursunov and reach the Citi Open final in Washington.
abstract: John Isner beats Dmitry Tursunov to reach Citi Open men's singles final and stretch his winning streak to eight matches; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Taking control by breaking serve immediately after a rain delay, eighth-seeded John Isner hit 29 aces to beat Dmitry Tursunov and reach the Citi Open final in Washington.
